main event: A civilian reported observing a stationary, luminous object in the sky over Beavercreek, Ohio on June 12, 1966.
interesting points: The object was large and circular in shape, hovering at an elevation of about 40 degrees above the horizon.
The object remained stationary for about 2 minutes, occasionally pulsing or changing brightness.
Three adult witnesses observed the object, which appeared to be about 1/2 mile away.
The witnesses reported the object made no sound and there were no other objects in the vicinity.
The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes.
